verses.verse: כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> If [one] be found חָלָ֗ל <S%H2491><s%> slain בָּאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֙ לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> thee to possess נֹפֵ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> it lying בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not נוֹדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> [and] it be not known מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who הִכָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H5221><s%> who hath slain

וְיָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> shall come forth זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <S%H2205><s%> Then thy elders וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יךָ <S%H8199><s%> and thy judges וּמָדְדוּ֙ <S%H4058><s%> and they shall measure אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> unto the cities אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיבֹ֥ת <S%H5439><s%> which [are] round about הֶחָלָֽל׃ <S%H2491><s%> him that is slain

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be that הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> And it shall be [that] the city הַקְּרֹבָ֖ה <S%H7138><s%> [which is] next אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הֶחָלָ֑ל <S%H2491><s%> unto the slain man וְלָֽקְח֡וּ <S%H3947><s%> shall take זִקְנֵי֩ <S%H2205><s%> even the elders הָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> of that city הַהִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> he עֶגְלַ֣ת <S%H5697><s%> A heifer בָּקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> of the herd אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not עֻבַּד֙ <S%H5647><s%> which hath not been wrought with בָּ֔הּ אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not מָשְׁכָ֖ה <S%H4900><s%> [and] which hath not drawn בְּעֹֽל׃ <S%H5923><s%> in the yoke

וְהוֹרִ֡דוּ <S%H3381><s%> shall bring down זִקְנֵי֩ <S%H2205><s%> And the elders הָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> of that city הַהִ֤וא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעֶגְלָה֙ <S%H5697><s%> the heifer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> valley אֵיתָ֔ן <S%H386><s%> unto a rough אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not יֵעָבֵ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> which is neither eared בּ֖וֹ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִזָּרֵ֑עַ <S%H2232><s%> nor sown וְעָֽרְפוּ־ <S%H6202><s%> neck שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <S%H5697><s%> the heifer's בַּנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> there in the valley

וְנִגְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H5066><s%> shall come near הַכֹּהֲנִים֮ <S%H3548><s%> And the priests בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons לֵוִי֒ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֗ם בָּחַ֞ר <S%H977><s%> hath chosen יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> for them the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <S%H8334><s%> to minister וּלְבָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> unto him and to bless בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and by פִּיהֶ֥ם <S%H6310><s%> and by their word יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every רִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> shall every controversy וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every נָֽגַע׃ <S%H5061><s%> and every stroke

וְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> All זִקְנֵי֙ <S%H2205><s%> And all the elders הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of that city הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> which הַקְּרֹבִ֖ים <S%H7138><s%> [that are] next אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הֶחָלָ֑ל <S%H2491><s%> unto the slain יִרְחֲצוּ֙ <S%H7364><s%> [man] shall wash אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <S%H5697><s%> over the heifer הָעֲרוּפָ֥ה <S%H6202><s%> that is beheaded בַנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> in the valley

וְעָנ֖וּ <S%H6030><s%> And they shall answer וְאָמְר֑וּ <S%H559><s%> and say יָדֵ֗ינוּ <S%H3027><s%> Our hands לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor [שָׁפְכָה כ] (שָֽׁפְכוּ֙ <S%H8210><s%> cast ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> this blood הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְעֵינֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5869><s%> neither have our eyes לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor רָאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> seen

כַּפֵּר֩ <S%H3722><s%> Be merciful לְעַמְּךָ֨ <S%H5971><s%> unto thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom פָּדִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6299><s%> whom thou hast redeemed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and lay דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> not innocent בְּקֶ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> charge עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> unto thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel's וְנִכַּפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall be forgiven לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like הַדָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> And the blood

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you תְּבַעֵ֛ר <S%H1197><s%> So shalt thou put away הַדָּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> blood הַנָּקִ֖י <S%H5355><s%> the [guilt of] innocent מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> from among כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> you when thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which is] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> When thou goest forth לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to war עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> against thine enemies וּנְתָנ֞וֹ <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּיָדֶ֖ךָ <S%H3027><s%> them into thine hands וְשָׁבִ֥יתָ <S%H7617><s%> and thou hast taken שִׁבְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H7617><s%> take

וְרָאִיתָ֙ <S%H7200><s%> And seest בַּשִּׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H7633><s%> among the captives אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman יְפַת־ <S%H3303><s%> A beautiful תֹּ֑אַר <S%H8389><s%> be drawn וְחָשַׁקְתָּ֣ <S%H2836><s%> and hast a desire בָ֔הּ וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> unto her that thou wouldest have her לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to thy wife

וַהֲבֵאתָ֖הּ <S%H935><s%> Then thou shalt bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> her home בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> to thine house וְגִלְּחָה֙ <S%H1548><s%> and she shall shave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשָׁ֔הּ <S%H7218><s%> her head וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and pare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִפָּרְנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6856><s%> her nails

וְהֵסִ֩ירָה֩ <S%H5493><s%> And she shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׂמְלַ֨ת <S%H8071><s%> the raiment שִׁבְיָ֜הּ <S%H7633><s%> captives מֵעָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְיָֽשְׁבָה֙ <S%H3427><s%> from off her and shall remain בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house וּבָֽכְתָ֛ה <S%H1058><s%> and bewail אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֥יהָ <S%H1><s%> her father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמָּ֖הּ <S%H517><s%> and her mother יֶ֣רַח <S%H3391><s%> month יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> a full וְאַ֨חַר <S%H310><s%> and after כֵּ֜ן <S%H3651><s%> after that תָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> that thou shalt go אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about וּבְעַלְתָּ֔הּ <S%H1167><s%> archer וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> and she shall be thy wife

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall be if לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> are not חָפַ֣צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> And it shall be if thou have no delight בָּ֗הּ וְשִׁלַּחְתָּהּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> in her then thou shalt let her go לְנַפְשָׁ֔הּ <S%H5315><s%> whither she will וּמָכֹ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> but thou shalt not sell לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִמְכְּרֶ֖נָּה <S%H4376><s%> her at all בַּכָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for money לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִתְעַמֵּ֣ר <S%H6014><s%> thou shalt not make merchandise בָּ֔הּ תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> of her because עִנִּיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6031><s%> thou hast humbled ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תִהְיֶ֨יןָ <S%H1961><s%> has לְאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> have two נָשִׁ֗ים <S%H802><s%> wives הָאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> one אֲהוּבָה֙ <S%H157><s%> beloved וְהָאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> and another שְׂנוּאָ֔ה <S%H8130><s%> hated וְיָֽלְדוּ־ <S%H3205><s%> and they have born ל֣וֹ בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> him children הָאֲהוּבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> [both] the beloved וְהַשְּׂנוּאָ֑ה <S%H8130><s%> and the hated וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> has הַבֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> and [if] the firstborn לַשְּׂנִיאָֽה׃ <S%H8146><s%> be hers that was hated

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> has בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> Then it shall be when הַנְחִיל֣וֹ <S%H5157><s%> to inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> he maketh his sons אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has ל֑וֹ לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> hath he יוּכַ֗ל <S%H3201><s%> [that] which he hath [that] he may לְבַכֵּר֙ <S%H1060><s%> [which is indeed] the firstborn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> not make the son הָ֣אֲהוּבָ֔ה <S%H157><s%> of the beloved עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַשְּׂנוּאָ֖ה <S%H8130><s%> of the hated הַבְּכֹֽר׃ <S%H1060><s%> is the firstborn

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּכֹ֨ר <S%H1060><s%> [for] the firstborn בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַשְּׂנוּאָ֜ה <S%H8130><s%> of the hated יַכִּ֗יר <S%H5234><s%> But he shall acknowledge לָ֤תֶת <S%H5414><s%> by giving לוֹ֙ פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> portion שְׁנַ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> him a double בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he יִמָּצֵ֖א <S%H4672><s%> of all that he hath ל֑וֹ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> for he [is] the beginning אֹנ֔וֹ <S%H202><s%> of his strength ל֖וֹ מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> the right הַבְּכֹרָֽה׃ <S%H1062><s%> of the firstborn ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has לְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man בֵּ֚ן <S%H1121><s%> son סוֹרֵ֣ר <S%H5637><s%> have a stubborn וּמוֹרֶ֔ה <S%H4784><s%> and rebellious אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <S%H369><s%> even שֹׁמֵ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> which will not obey בְּק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> of his father וּבְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> or the voice אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> of his mother וְיִסְּר֣וּ <S%H3256><s%> and [that] when they have chastened אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> even יִשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> him will not hearken אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְתָ֥פְשׂוּ <S%H8610><s%> lay hold ב֖וֹ אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> Then shall his father וְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother וְהוֹצִ֧יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> on him and bring him out אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders עִיר֖וֹ <S%H5892><s%> of his city וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> and unto the gate מְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> of his place

וְאָמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> And they shall say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders עִיר֗וֹ <S%H5892><s%> of his city בְּנֵ֤נוּ <S%H1121><s%> This our son זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> This סוֹרֵ֣ר <S%H5637><s%> [is] stubborn וּמֹרֶ֔ה <S%H4784><s%> and rebellious אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> will not שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> he will not obey בְּקֹלֵ֑נוּ <S%H6963><s%> our voice זוֹלֵ֖ל <S%H2151><s%> [he is] a glutton וְסֹבֵֽא׃ <S%H5435><s%> drink
